title: Graph of velocity which ship has engine on

content.question: Does at least one of the ships have its engine turned on during the time interval shown, and what evidence indicates so?

choices.label: Yes, because Ship 2 is speeding up.
Yes, because the momentum of the two-rocket system increases.
Yes, because an engine is needed to keep the system moving.
No, because the cable alone could be responsible for making Ship 1 slow down and Ship 2 speed up.

content.answer: Yes, because the momentum of the two-rocket system increases.

skill.text: 3.C: Justify or support a claim using evidence from experimental data, physical representations, or physical principles or laws.
